channel.title: Travel on ryan straight
channel.description: Recent content in Travel on ryan straight

item.title: New Orleans 2017
item.description:
New Orleans is one of my favorite cities to visit. The food, the sights, the art. Here are a bunch of photos we took!

Lafayette Cemetery

We took a trip to Lafeyette Cemetery! Well, one of them. (Click on a photo to lightbox.)

{{< gallery album=“lafayette-cemetery” >}}

Voodoo Museum

Then we went to the New Orleans Historic Voodoo Museum, of course.

{{< gallery album=“voodoo-museum” >}}

Oh, and if you’re wandering through the French Quarter, make sure to stop into Galatoires and ask for the Sazerac with a history lesson and the “special pour.”
